# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and high-quality materials, it's truly a remarkable investment. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you with an offer of $200, reflecting its exceptional value and the benefits it brings. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier solution. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
